I don't believe we ship any automatic recovery tools. Though  
something like this could be built using the hcc APIs.

I've opened a bug in case we can fix it on our end:
http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-1126

Could I get some more information about your system? Which version of  
OS/Heritrix are you using?

Thanks,

-Paul
